dublin_core.dcvalue: Panel Lessons Learned from Surveillance How can we learn from inter sectoral surveillance and primary health care services What steps might we take to harness mHealth applications for real time biosurveillance of infectious disease What can case studies from Ebola teach us in applying learning toward Zika How has mobile technology provided Ebola survivors with timely targeted support Presented by Solomon Abiola Ph D Predoctoral Researcher Computer Science and Translational Biomedical Sciences
Network Based Approaches to Studying Ebola and Emerging Infectious Diseases in Real-time Using Smartphones
